should Tall Men Marry?, Scorching Sands, Wandering Papas, Mum's The Word, Mighty Like A Mouse, the bakery, love and duty, Angora love, zenobia and air raid wardens. 
Appreciate your work man. If anyone have any of these great classics. please seed! Thnx.
